extends Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MoreLikeThisOpenedMatchingContext andField(String fieldname)
      Add one field to the fields selected to match the content.
      MoreLikeThisOpenedMatchingContext boostedTo(float boost)
      Boost the field to a given value Most of the time positive float: - lower than 1 to diminish the weight - higher than 1 to increase the weight Could be negative but not unless you understand what is going on (advanced)
      MoreLikeThisOpenedMatchingContext ignoreAnalyzer()
      Advanced Do not execute the analyzer on the text.
      MoreLikeThisOpenedMatchingContext ignoreFieldBridge()
      Do not try and find the field bridge nor apply the object / string conversion matching objects should be of type String in this case.
      MoreLikeThisToEntityContentAndTermination toEntity(Object entity) 
      MoreLikeThisTermination toEntityWithId(Object id)
      Find other entities looking like the entity with the given id.

    • Method Detail

      • andField

        public MoreLikeThisOpenedMatchingContext andField(String fieldname)
        Description copied from interface: MoreLikeThisOpenedMatchingContext
        Add one field to the fields selected to match the content. An exception is thrown if the field are neither storing the term vectors nor physically stored. We highly recommend to store the term vectors if you plan on using More Like This queries.
        Specified by:
        andField in interface MoreLikeThisOpenedMatchingContext
        Parameters:
        fieldname - the name of the field
        Returns:
        this for method chaining

      • boostedTo

        public MoreLikeThisOpenedMatchingContext boostedTo(float boost)
        Description copied from interface: FieldCustomization
        Boost the field to a given value Most of the time positive float: - lower than 1 to diminish the weight - higher than 1 to increase the weight Could be negative but not unless you understand what is going on (advanced)
        Specified by:
        boostedTo in interface FieldCustomization<MoreLikeThisOpenedMatchingContext>
        Parameters:
        boost - the boost value, it can be negative (advance)
        Returns:
        an instance of T for method chaining

      • ignoreAnalyzer

        public MoreLikeThisOpenedMatchingContext ignoreAnalyzer()
        Description copied from interface: FieldCustomization
        Advanced Do not execute the analyzer on the text. (It is usually a good idea to apply the analyzer)
        Specified by:
        ignoreAnalyzer in interface FieldCustomization<MoreLikeThisOpenedMatchingContext>
        Returns:
        an instance of T for method chaining

      • ignoreFieldBridge

        public MoreLikeThisOpenedMatchingContext ignoreFieldBridge()
        Description copied from interface: FieldCustomization
        Do not try and find the field bridge nor apply the object / string conversion matching objects should be of type String in this case.
        Specified by:
        ignoreFieldBridge in interface FieldCustomization<MoreLikeThisOpenedMatchingContext>
        Returns:
        an instance of T for method chaining

      • toEntityWithId

        public MoreLikeThisTermination toEntityWithId(Object id)
        Description copied from interface: MoreLikeThisMatchingContext
        Find other entities looking like the entity with the given id. Only the selected fields will be used for comparison.
        Specified by:
        toEntityWithId in interface MoreLikeThisMatchingContext
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of the entity
        Returns:
        this for method chaining
